directory.name: src
directory.purpose: The `src` directory houses the source code for a temporary project, including reusable UI components, custom React hooks, type definitions, utility functions, and project assets.

subdirectories.name: assets
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: This directory, `src\assets`, stores the assets used in the project.

subdirectories.name: components
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: This directory, `src\components`, houses reusable UI components for a todo application, including input, item display, filtering, and statistics.

subdirectories.name: hooks
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\hooks` directory stores custom React hooks for a temporary project.

subdirectories.name: types
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The directory `src\types` stores type definitions for a project, likely within a temporary repository.

subdirectories.name: utils
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\utils` directory contains utility functions and supporting code for a project.
